page.title: 04BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {Mr.Boote}has lived in Madresfield for 5 years, and worked in {Madresfield {Post Office}for four and a half years. Before that he worked in a restaurant as an accountant. He enjoys the job, but he doesn't always agree with the customers.As Post Master,he has to know P.O. rules, and be responsible for mail and stamps.He also sells a lot of tobacco and sweets. Before Mr.Boote, the Postmaster was Mr.Troughton. {The Post Office}was built in 1863, when it was a Telegram and Post Office. The malot of tobacco and sweets. Before Mr.Boote, the Postmaster was Mr.Troughton.{The {Post Office}was built in 1863, when it was a Telegram and Post Office. The mail was sent by horse and trap. By Annabel Cameron,Samantha Delmont
